attributes.title: This is not okay...
attributes.review: I installed the app so i could keep up with DJT! But it is not what i expected turns out its a lies! I cannot with this all they say its age constricted for 17+ IT SHOULD BE CONSTRICTED TO EVERYONE! The things being shown on this app are all lies i think the app is glitching because its all lies and theres child pornography on their children in cages WHAT IS THIS MADNESS! This is not okay thats why i give 1 star rating i would give 0 if i could!

attributes.title: Scary!😡
attributes.review: I opened the app and saw a scary cheeto😿 I had to bleach my eyes😎 the same night I saw the Cheeto standing behind me in my mirror!😍 I couldn’t go to sleep because I caught him staring through my window❤️ silly Cheeto!😼 then he decided to eat all my cats food and then cry about people making fun of him on this app called tiktok!🥳 he told me he was gonna ban it! But the next day, he stole my cat and ate her!😿 I’m telling you DONT GET THIS APP! The Cheeto WILL haunt you!!🙈

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP - super glitchy!
attributes.review: I never thought I would have to write this. But my god, this app is terrible!! The minute I opened it it was glitchy and made my phone crash. My friend also tried it and the same happened. If you don’t wanna spend hundreds of dollars to pay for a new phone or to fix it, I reccomend not getting this app. APPLE PLEASE CONSIDER TAKING THIS APP DOWN!!! I’m so disappointed in America and this app smh.

attributes.title: Disgusted.
attributes.review:
I open this dreadful app just for it to ask if it can send me notifications??? WHY THE HECK WOULD I WANT TRUMP NOTIFICATIONS.  
The news is not credible, I would never ever trust this app.  Donald Trump is a white supremacist, full stop.  I will support literally any other candidate.  Trump is a disgusting pedo and rapist, if he was a black man he’d be out of office and behind bars.  But this is America, and if you have enough money and skin light enough anyone can be free.

attributes.title: Disappointed as fellow trump supporter😔✊🏿
attributes.review: I love trump merica 2020 snowflake 🤠💯🤪❄️ but i was displeased when me and my lovely son abor shawn 🥰wanted to get tickets for a rally :( we purchased them and they cost so much !🙄 And we never received the tickets after waiting months this app is fake😭 !1!1!1! in case ur alsO a trump lover rate it a 1 star to let mr trump know! So if u support trump lets get rid of this glitchy app and get a new and improved one!

attributes.title: The worse app ever 👁👄👁
attributes.review:
It is simply useless, it should be taken from the app store.  🥰😍Trump 2020 but in a grave~ 😙🧚‍♀️🖤

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought to myself I am a Trump supporter so why not just download the app. When I open this app there was a lady standing there naked on the front of the screen. And I was like what just happened. There must be some glitch so I just log back out of it and it was still there I am very disappointed in this creation!! it needs to be off the market

attributes.title: You’re kidding me?
attributes.review: I’m a huge supporter of Cheeto man and when I heard of this app I knew I just had to have it, but when I opened it my phone started glitching tf out! My whole phone broke! I took it into a shop to get it fixed and they said they couldn’t because I had a Cheeto virus! So I threw the whole phone away! And even the card was effed up! So now I’m writing this review on my sisters phone

attributes.title: STAN BTS
attributes.review: BTS (Korean: 방탄소년단; RR: Bangtan Sonyeondan), also known as the Bangtan Boys, is a seven-member South Korean boy band formed in Seoul in 2010.[3] The septet co-writes and produces much of their output. Originally a hip hop group, their musical style has evolved to include a wide range of genres. Their lyrics, often focused on personal and social commentary, touch on the themes of mental health, troubles of school-age youth, loss, the journey towards loving oneself, and individualism. Their work features references to literature and psychological concepts and includes an alternative universe storyline.
